jobDescription: We're looking for our first data scientist hire to help us build out our property evaluation and pricing tooling. As the first hire in this role, you'll be doing a bit of everything from exploratory data analysis to feature extraction to building ML pipelines in production to setting the overall pricing strategy.  We're looking for someone who is entrepreneurial, a self-starter and looks to do the impossible each and every day because you know that's the only way to build a transformational business.  As far as qualifications go, we're looking for someone with 3+ years of Engineering & Data Science experience, familiarity with various machine learning techniques and a proven track record of taking experimental findings and productizing them.Compensation$80K – $130K 0% – 2.0%
